path.description: Full file system path to the skills directory

no_key_required.description: Whether provider requires no API key

proxy_url.description: HTTP or SOCKS proxy URL (e.g., http://127.0.0.1:7890 or socks5://127.0.0.1:1080)

older_than_days.description: Delete records older than this many days

locations.description: Array of skill locations to import

force_refresh.description: Force new probe even if cached

name.description: Custom name for the provider (optional, auto-generated if empty)

proxy_url.description: HTTP/SOCKS proxy URL (e.g., http://127.0.0.1:7890 or socks5://127.0.0.1:1080)

redirect.description: URL to redirect after OAuth completion

user_id.description: User ID for the OAuth flow

provider_uuid.description: Provider UUID to refresh token for

message.example: API key is valid and accessible

no_key_required.description: Whether provider requires no API key
